page.title: 09SPORTS CLUB
page.content: There has been an active Sports Club in Craigrothie since 1975. It meets in the Village Hall. Members can enjoy Dominoes,Darts,Swingball and Table Tennis. There are plenty of trophies to be won. There are two sections: Juniors age 5 to 12 Seniors over 12 There is no upper age limit. At present there are 16 junior members and 14 senior members. The membership fee is 60p for Juniors,Â£1.oo for Seniors and for Adults,who get the chance of indoor bowls,Â£2.00 The Club meets every Monday evening from September to May.
